Mausam — Weather Project

College project • Author: Pankaj Rajak
About this project

Mausam is a college project demonstrating a simple, real-world weather application built with Node.js and Express for the backend and a minimal Tailwind CSS frontend. It showcases practical features useful for a semester project.

  • Current weather + 5-day forecast (OpenWeatherMap)
  • Geocoding and browser geolocation with IP fallback
  • In-memory caching for API responses
  • Ready to deploy on Azure App Service

How to run: clone the repo, run npm install and then npm start. The app listens on the port set by PORT env or 3000 by default.
